For more than two decades, we have been at the leading edge, innovating digitally connected systems.
Every day, we drive efficiency, safety and productivity in utilities, industry and transport globally.
With a heritage spanning more than 40 years, C5 Industries operates in more than 15 countries and employs around 15,000 people.
Products, systems and services designed to optimize the productivity of industrial processes.
Motors, generators, drives, mechanical power transmission, robotics, wind and traction converters.
Automation products, systems, and software solutions across the generation and distribution value chain.
